data.message: **Welcome to the CoLa Game!** Discussion and providing reason(s) for your answer is crucial for this game.

message: **Welcome to the CoLa Game!** Discussion and providing reason(s) for your answer is crucial for this game.

data.message:
Remember the following commands to play the game: 

(1) Propose answer to your partner: Type "/answer ...your description here...". 

(2) Agree on the answer proposed by your partner: Type "/agree".

message:
Remember the following commands to play the game: 

(1) Propose answer to your partner: Type "/answer ...your description here...". 

(2) Agree on the answer proposed by your partner: Type "/agree".

data.message: Please type **/ready** to begin the game.

message: Please type **/ready** to begin the game.

data.message: Now, waiting for your partner to type /ready.

message: Now, waiting for your partner to type /ready.

data.text:
Which one is described by this?



Try to come to a common conclusion. Then, one of you must propose your joint answer, together with the justification. 

A proposal starts with "/answer", and then the text. For example: *"/answer The text describes the first picture because the bird has a black tail.".*

The other player must then type "/agree", to show that this answer is indeed the joint answer. 

You can keep discussing after a proposal has been made, but the round only ends once one of you has typed a proposal and the other has agreed to it.

text:
Which one is described by this?



Try to come to a common conclusion. Then, one of you must propose your joint answer, together with the justification. 

A proposal starts with "/answer", and then the text. For example: *"/answer The text describes the first picture because the bird has a black tail.".*

The other player must then type "/agree", to show that this answer is indeed the joint answer. 

You can keep discussing after a proposal has been made, but the round only ends once one of you has typed a proposal and the other has agreed to it.

data.message: a1 has left the game. Please wait a bit, your partner may rejoin.

message: a1 has left the game. Please wait a bit, your partner may rejoin.
